audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Science/Research

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: MIT License

name: SCons gnuplot tool
short_description:
SCons is a make replacement providing a range of enhanced features such as automated dependency generation and built in compilation cache support.  SCons rule sets are Python scripts so as well as the features it provides itself SCons allows you to use the full power of Python to control compilation.

This package is an extension (tool) to SCons, which enables "compilation" of gnuplot scripts in SCons-based projects. The intended audience include (but is not limited to) authors/publishers of LaTeX documents, scientific comunity and authors of the projects relying on automatic generation of plots.
summary: SCons tool to cooperate with gnuplot program
